name: Robot Squad Simulator 2017
description: Become an elite pilot of special Robot Squad. Use specialized, remotely controlled robots, which you will control yourself. Deal with the hardest missions which can't be performed directly by people due to the conditions. Human life and safety is in your hands!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Core i3 3.1 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / Radeon HD6870 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows  7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Core i5-2300 / AMD Athlon X4 760K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD7970 2 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
